Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
18.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Adjusted argument list for ODHC01
31.05.2013 SH SCR15327 Added GSET_YESNO(8006) to trigger call of old/new version of BDC201DC (2 places)
12.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
29.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
17.04.2011 GB SCR16390 Changed condition for Check if debtor already exists
30.06.2009 GB SCR14705 Added part for validate national registration numbers
(Task Online before activating BDC201DH)
07.02.2009 GB SCR14368 Replaced 'F2'Kbd by RaiseEvent = Cancel
18.04.2008 SH SCR13475 Removed DCHB handling
23.12.2004 SH SCR7582 Added para PO.DEBC_NO, see also SCR7345, also
to argument list of BDC201DC after storing new debtor heller (Function of button
'New Heller Debtor")
23.12.2004 SH SCR7579 Added test if new debtor is allowed (Check on DHIC)
16.11.2004 SH SCR7345 Added new para PO.DEBC_NO, which included the new
DEBC_NO after storing new debtor client with BDC201DC, uses in OMQ013A
02.11.2004 SH SCR5381 Removed handler "Select" from online task and enable
handler "UserAction 20" only if a debtor heller was entered/selected
21.09.2004 SH SCR7030 Changed text "Onw jug..." to "Own jug..." on screen
23.08.2004 SH SCR6843 Added new fields (credit/financelimit fields) to screen
04.08.2004 SH SCR6626 Send ADMNO/CLNTNO as expression to ODHC01, to avoid
auto. changing of DCLN_ADMNO/DCLN_CLNTNO; Removed special tests for DCLN_DEBH
regarding to DCLN_NMATCH
12.07.2004 SH SCR6626 Added new test "Client debtors not allowed on this credit
07.07.2004 SH SCR6528 Put the calls of BDH201DC and BDC201DH in one task
which opens a transaction for both programs
07.07.2004 SH SCR6528 Set v.WhatToDo = '' if actions of button "New debtor" were
performed, prevents the double call of BDC201DC
//07.06.2004 EE SCR3193 Pushbutton handling
//26.02.2004 EE SCR5511 new parameter for mainscreen
//18-11-2003 JP SCR #2413 implement search up/down
05.12.2002 SCR2536 Add new fields DCLN_INFS_CODE and DCLN_DHIC_ID to screen
22.07.2002 SCR1735 SH Add new button "Change Heller debtor" and call ODH001
08.07.2002 SH SCR1535 Park Cursor in onlineprogram on control "DCLN_DEBH"
29.04.2002 SH SCR 1196 New requirements, DCLN_DEFAULTLANGUAGE, new fields
- DCLN_RUNNUMBER
10.04.2002 SH Changed call to ODHC01 --> new program
-- SCR#416 --> OK 13.12.2001 (Search Debtor, new searchparameters)
Pushbutton handling
Pushbutton handling
-- Change debtor heller
-- Store new debtor heller
-- New debtor only allowed, if DLCN_LANGUAGE is known
-- New debtor only allowed, if there exists no debtor in DHIC
-- Unlock DCLN-ROW after pressing Button Cancel, key 'Esc' or
-- Cancel in the toolbar
-- Don't move this operation to a belower section, because it's not
-- required to unlock the row if it's delete or stored in the real
-- table DEBC
-- Delete
-- Store new debtor client new in the real tabel DEBC, after pressing
-- Button OK, if a debtor heller was entered/selected
... old version of BDC201DC
... new version of BDC201DC (SCR15327)
-- see remark in R.S.
-- Get language name to display on screen
-- Validation of DCLN_LANGUAGE
-- Check if DEBH_NO exist in DATABASE --> Table DCNA
-- Disabled since 04.08.2004 SH SCR6626
-- Validation of Debtor number heller if DCLN_NMATCH > 0
-- Validation of Debtor number heller if DCLN_NMATCH = 0
-- Validation of Debtor number heller
-- Get data from debtor heller to display on screen
-- Park Cursor on control "DCLN_DEBH"
-- End Loop after pressing key 'Esc'
-- Leave program after pressing Button Cancel, key 'Esc' or calling
-- an other program from the menue
-- Ask User for confirmation if he pressed key 'Esc', Button 'Cancel'
-- or started directly an other program from the menue
-- Validation entries
Validate national registration numbers

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[ODC200B]: Online match of new debtors')

Text.val: -- OK
-- Change debtor heller
-- Cancel
-- Cancel without saving
-- Cancel with saving
-- After pressing Button Cancel, the loop over all DCLN-rows, which
-- are in the unique Range DCLN_ADMNO and DCLN_CLNTNO, will be
-- stopped. This is hanbeld in program ODC200!

-- Delete confirmed
-- Deleteoperation aborted
-- Store New DebtorHeller
